EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Bob, Hope you had a nice weekend. I just wanted to follow up on your MBO enrollment and see if you had any questions for me on the process. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"> Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, February 09, 2012 1:37 PM To: Bob Cooper (b.cooper@mac.com) Subject: MBO Patners Call Follow Up Dear Bob , It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeR9aukhm7u65L6ju0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D">going here. We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here. I will follow up with you as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
